text: Christopher Whitelaw "Chris" Pine (born August 26, 1980) is an American actor. He is best known for his roles as Steve Trevor in Wonder Woman (2017) and the sequel Wonder Woman 1984 (2019) and as James T. Kirk in the 2009 movie Star Trek. Pine has been in a relationship with British actress Annabelle Wallis since 2018. == Filmography == Year Title Role Notes 2003 ER Levine Episode: "A Thousand Cranes" 2003 Lonnie Grandy Episode: "Hazel Park" 2003 CSI: Miami Tommy Chandler Episode: "Extreme" 2004 Why Germany?
